climbing_gloves.desc: Have in your inventory to scale walls by walking into them
item_cheap_magnet.desc: Attracts all sorts of things, some dangerous. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
item_electro_magnet.desc: Attracts item entities and xp orbs, requires power. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
parashoes.desc: Wear these shoes to slow your decent
pipette.desc: Holds up to one bucket of fluid, useful for removing fluid amounts less than one bucket. Right click fluid handling tiles to insert and extract fluid
spawner_relocator.desc: Hold right click and release while looking at a spawner to pick it up, hold right click while aiming at a block to place it back down
